casebody.data:
TD BANK, N.A.
v.
EAGLES CREST AT SHARP TOP, LLC, et al. 350PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 6, 2017 David R. Payne, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Brian W. Sharpe, Attorney at Law, for Eagles Crest At Sharp Top, LLC, et al. Norman J. Leonard, Attorney at Law, Lance P. Martin, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for TD Bank, N.A.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of July 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of July 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 19th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
